p: For the assay of the biochemical parameters, the frozen hippocampi were allowed to thaw for 2 min at room temperature upon which they were individually homogenized (1:10) in ice-cold 0.1 M potassium phosphate buffer (pH 7.4), 1.15% KCl by using a Potter Homogenizer (Cole-Parmer, Vernon Hills, IL, USA). The homogenates were centrifuged at 960× g for 15 min at 4 °C. The supernatant was used for the estimation of protein carbonyl and malondialdehyde (MDA) levels following the methods described [ 34]. The total protein content was determined using a bicinchoninic acid (BCA) protein assay kit (Sigma-Aldrich, Darmstadt, Germany) according to a method previously described [ 37].
